data.question: What is Freelix?
answer: Freelix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, all for free. There's always something new to discover, and new TV shows and movies are added every week!

data.question: How do I watch?
answer: First, you have to create an account, then select your preferences, like: watch-time, mood, and category type. Then you will watch your movies/series according to your preference.

data.question: Where can I watch?
answer: Watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your Freelix account to watch instantly on the web at Freelix-latest.netlify.app from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device, smartphone, or tablet.

data.question: How do I cancel?
answer: Freelix is flexible. There are no annoying contacts and no commitments. You can easily cancel you account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees - start or stop your account anytime.

data.question: What can I watch on Freelix?
answer: Freelix has an extensive library of feature films, documentries, TV shows, anime, award-winning Freelix originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.
